name: RTS3
description:
RTS3

You're stranded in an asteroid field and aliens are coming soon. Build up a base, harvest metal from asteroids, and take the fight to them.

Note:

To build on asteroids you must have a ship nearby. Pull up the build menu (selected building doesn't actually matter) and click on the asteroid. 

Controls:

Camera -  WASD and scroll (sorry, scrolling is finicky, I made it on trackpad)

Drag over units to select them, right click to set their destination. Hold shift to queue additional destinations.

1- Select all onscreen units

Q - Select Unassigned units

F - Select all onscreen factories

E - Select unassigned factories

B: Toggle Build Menu

-------1 - Build Factory

-------2 - Build Hab

-------3- Build Solar panel

-------4- Build Turret
